title: Shop Sign Board Pack
description: Top class Signage Package, wide range of customizable designs that come in expert signage package ideal to fit in all imaginable themed scenes.
longDescription:
Preview: youtube.com/watch?v=h_6UJ_Z9Ixo

Beautifully done, high quality signage package that is ideal to use in all types of possible scenes, from a rusty sign that fits in post apocalypse setting to clean and slick design that matches any modern exteriors to heavily weathered and dirt accumulated sign that suits in an abandoned town .

The package contains 14 sign posts, each comes with 2 to 3 variations, totaling 41 sign posts. 10 sign boards with 2 - 4 variations for each, totaling 30 sign boards. All items come with materials that are customizable with different surfaces - painted metal, wood, plastic and etc to provide limitless combinations, level of rust, dirt and other details of customization that allows the user to explore different ways to express the sign.

The package also includes blueprints that:
1. Spawn the sign post together with the sign boards , custom transition and scale adjustment available to fine tune the signboards.
2. Spawn only sign boards with multiple adjustment.
3. Spawn the 3d Alphabet for various with fully functioned material customization and etc.

Also include 10 PBR texture/material

Bonus content: 62 3D alphabet character meshes that could be used in all sort of situations. 9 fictional royalty free advertisement posters that can be added to your own advertisement poster.

Example Blueprints are provided for references for easy accessibility of the various functionalities (see the video) and various examples of Blueprint used can be found in the maps "Developer Testing"
technicalDetails:
Number of Blueprints: 3
List of Features: Spawn Signpost and signboard, Spawn Signboard, Spawn 3d Alphabet (All allow customization for Dirt, rust, color and material)
Video Link
Physically-Based Rendering: Yes
Texture Size: 4096 to 512
Collision: Yes, Auto Generate
Vertex Count: 5034 ~24
LODs: 3 lod level
Number of Meshes: 133
Number of Materials and Material Instances: 33
Number of Textures: 221
Intended Platform: Windows, Xbox One, Playstation 4
Platforms Tested: Windows
Documentation Included: No
